## Arguments

| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |
| `type` | `Symbol` | `:button` | One of `:button` and `:submit`. |
| `system_arguments` | `Hash` | N/A | [System arguments](/system-arguments) |
